statements: SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule
SELECT task_name, schedule_date FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE task_status = 'Pending'
SELECT schedule_id, task_name FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_technician FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT task_name, assigned_technician FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE assigned_technician LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT task_name, schedule_date FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE task_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT assigned_technician FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule;
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_id, technician_id FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_phone FROM FieldTechnician WHERE technician_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT schedule_date, schedule_time, technician_name FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule JOIN FieldTechnician ON SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule.technician_id = FieldTechnician.technician_id;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_date FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE technician_id = 3;
SELECT technician_name, technician_email FROM FieldTechnician WHERE technician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_time FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE technician_id = 2 ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, task_description FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules WHERE schedule_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_phone FROM field_technicians WHERE technician_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM task_assignments WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY assignment_date;
SELECT field_id, schedule_date, task_description FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules WHERE field_id = 12345 AND schedule_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, field_id, schedule_date FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT schedule_id, field_id, task_description FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules ORDER BY task_description DESC;
SELECT * FROM field_technicians WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT field_id, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedules GROUP BY field_id HAVING task_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule;
SELECT task_name, scheduled_date, scheduled_time FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE technician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Technician WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM SoilHealthTask ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT scheduled_date, scheduled_time FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, scheduled_date FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE technician_id = 1;
SELECT technician_name, technician_contact FROM Technician ORDER BY technician_name DESC;
SELECT st.task_name, st.task_description, fta.assigned_date FROM SoilHealthTask st JOIN FieldTechnicianAssignment fta ON st.task_id = fta.schedule_id WHERE st.task_id = 2;
SELECT schedule_id, technician_id, task_name FROM SoilHealthMonitoringSchedule WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY scheduled_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedule;
SELECT task_id, scheduled_date, status FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedule WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT site_id, site_name, site_location FROM field_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_phone, technician_email FROM field_technicians WHERE technician_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_duration FROM tasks WHERE task_duration > 5;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, task_id, scheduled_date FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedule WHERE status='completed';
SELECT task_name, task_description, task_duration FROM tasks ORDER BY task_duration DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_email FROM field_technicians WHERE technician_phone LIKE '%555%';

SELECT s.schedule_id, t.task_name, fs.site_name FROM soil_health_monitoring_schedule s JOIN tasks t ON s.task_id = t.task_id JOIN field_sites fs ON t.task_id = fs.site_id ORDER BY s.scheduled_date ASC;
